# 修改用户部分信息

该接口用于更新通讯录中用户的字段，未传递的参数不会更新。接口只会返回应用有数据权限的字段，具体的数据权限与字段的关系请参考[应用权限](/ssl:ttdoc/ukTMukTMukTM/uQjN3QjL0YzN04CN2cDN)。{尝试一下}(url=/api/tools/api_explore/api_explore_config?project=contact&version=v3&resource=user&method=patch)

:::html
<md-alert type="error">

</md-alert>
:::

:::html
<md-alert type="warn">

</md-alert>
:::

:::html
<md-alert type="tip">

</md-alert>
:::



## 请求
:::html
<md-table>
  <md-thead>
  <tr>
      <md-th>基本</md-th>
      <md-th></md-th>
  </tr>
  </md-thead>
  <md-tbody>
    <md-tr>
      <md-th>HTTP URL</md-th>
      <md-td>https://open.feishu.cn/open-apis/contact/v3/users/:user_id</md-td>
    </md-tr>
    <md-tr>
      <md-th>HTTP Method</md-th>
      <md-td>PATCH</md-td>
    </md-tr>
    <md-tr>
      <md-th>权限要求</md-th>
      <md-td>
            <md-perm href="/ssl:ttdoc/ukTMukTMukTM/uQjN3QjL0YzN04CN2cDN">更新用户基本信息</md-perm>
            <md-perm href="/ssl:ttdoc/ukTMukTMukTM/uQjN3QjL0YzN04CN2cDN">更新通讯录</md-perm>
      </md-td>
    </md-tr>
    <md-tr>
      <md-th>字段权限要求</md-th>
      <md-td>
        <md-perm href="/ssl:ttdoc/ukTMukTMukTM/uQjN3QjL0YzN04CN2cDN">获取用户 userid</md-perm>
        <md-perm href="/ssl:ttdoc/ukTMukTMukTM/uQjN3QjL0YzN04CN2cDN">获取用户邮箱</md-perm>
        <md-perm href="/ssl:ttdoc/ukTMukTMukTM/uQjN3QjL0YzN04CN2cDN">获取用户手机号</md-perm>
      </md-td>
    </md-tr>
  </md-tbody>
</md-table>
:::


### 请求头
:::html
<md-table>
  <md-thead>
    <md-tr>
      <md-th style="width: 18%;">名称</md-th>
      <md-th style="width: 15%;">类型</md-th>
       <md-th style="width: 15%;">必填</md-th>
      <md-th>描述</md-th>
    </md-tr>
  </md-thead>
  <md-tbody>
    <md-tr>
      <md-td>Authorization</md-td>
      <md-td>string</md-td>
      <md-td>是</md-td>
      	<md-td>
<md-tag mode="inline" type="token-tenant">tenant_access_token</md-tag>
或
<md-tag mode="inline" type="token-user">user_access_token</md-tag>

**值格式**："Bearer `access_token`"

**示例值**："Bearer u-7f1bcd13fc57d46bac21793a18e560"

[了解更多：获取与使用access_token](/ssl:ttdoc/ukTMukTMukTM/uMTNz4yM1MjLzUzM)
</md-td>
</md-tr>
     <md-tr>
      <md-td>Content-Type</md-td>
      <md-td>string</md-td>
      <md-td>是</md-td>
      <md-td>**固定值**："application/json; charset=utf-8"</md-td>
</md-tr>
</md-tbody>
</md-table>
:::



### 路径参数
:::html
<md-table>
  <md-thead>
      <tr>
      <md-th style="width: 30%;">名称</md-th>
      <md-th style="width: 15%;">类型</md-th>
      <md-th >描述</md-th>
      </tr>
  </md-thead>
  <md-tbody>

<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >user_id</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	用户ID，需要与查询参数中的user_id_type类型保持一致。

**示例值**："ou_7dab8a3d3cdcc9da365777c7ad535d62"
	</md-td>
</md-tr>

  </md-tbody>
</md-table>
:::



### 查询参数
:::html
<md-table>
  <md-thead>
      <tr>
      <md-th style="width: 30%;">名称</md-th>
      <md-th style="width: 15%;">类型</md-th>
      <md-th style="width: 15%;">必填</md-th>
      <md-th >描述</md-th>
      </tr>
  </md-thead>
  <md-tbody>

<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >user_id_type</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	
用户 ID 类型

**示例值**："open_id"

**可选值有**：
- `open_id`：用户的 open id
- `union_id`：用户的 union id
- `user_id`：用户的 user id

**默认值**：`open_id`

**当值为 `user_id`，字段权限要求**：
<md-perm href="/ssl:ttdoc/ukTMukTMukTM/uQjN3QjL0YzN04CN2cDN">获取用户 userid</md-perm>
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >department_id_type</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	此次调用中使用的部门ID的类型

**示例值**："open_department_id"

**可选值有**：
- `department_id`：以自定义department_id来标识部门
- `open_department_id`：以open_department_id来标识部门

**默认值**：`open_department_id`
	</md-td>
</md-tr>

  </md-tbody>
</md-table>
:::



### 请求体
:::html
引用类型：<md-text type="field-type" >user</md-text>
:::
:::html
<md-table>
  <md-thead>
      <md-tr>
      <md-th style="width: 40%;">名称</md-th>
      <md-th style="width: 20%;">类型</md-th>
      <md-th style="width: 10%;">必填</md-th>
      <md-th style="width: 30%;">描述</md-th>
      </md-tr>
  </md-thead>
  <md-tbody>

<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >name</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	用户名

**示例值**："张三"

**数据校验规则**：

- 最小长度：`1` 字符
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >en_name</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	英文名

**示例值**："San Zhang"
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >email</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	邮箱

**示例值**："zhangsan@gmail.com"

**字段权限要求**：
 <md-perm href="/ssl:ttdoc/ukTMukTMukTM/uQjN3QjL0YzN04CN2cDN">获取用户邮箱</md-perm>
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >mobile</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	手机号

**示例值**："13011111111"
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >mobile_visible</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >boolean</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	手机号码可见性，true 为可见，false 为不可见，目前默认为 true。不可见时，组织员工将无法查看该员工的手机号码

**示例值**：false
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >gender</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >int</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	性别

**示例值**：1

**可选值有**：
- `0`：保密
- `1`：男
- `2`：女
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >avatar_key</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	头像的文件Key，可通过“消息与群组/消息/图片信息”中的“上传图片”接口上传并获取头像文件 Key

**示例值**："2500c7a9-5fff-4d9a-a2de-3d59614ae28g"
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >department_ids</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string\[\]</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	用户所属部门的ID列表
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >leader_user_id</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	用户的直接主管的用户ID

**示例值**："ou_7dab8a3d3cdcc9da365777c7ad535d62"
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >city</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	城市

**示例值**："杭州"
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >country</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	国家

**示例值**："中国"
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >work_station</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	工位

**示例值**："杭州"
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >join_time</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >int</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	入职时间

**示例值**：2147483647
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >employee_no</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	工号

**示例值**："1"
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >employee_type</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >int</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	员工类型

**示例值**：1
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >orders</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >user_order\[\]</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	用户排序信息
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >department_id</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	排序信息对应的部门ID

**示例值**："od-4e6ac4d14bcd5071a37a39de902c7141"
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >user_order</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >int</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	用户在其直属部门内的排序，数值越大，排序越靠前

**示例值**：100
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >department_order</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >int</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	用户所属的多个部门间的排序，数值越大，排序越靠前

**示例值**：100
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >custom_attrs</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >user_custom_attr\[\]</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	自定义属性
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >type</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	自定义属性类型

**示例值**："TEXT"
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >id</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	自定义属性ID

**示例值**："DemoId"
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >value</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >user_custom_attr_value</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	自定义属性取值
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >text</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	属性文本

**示例值**："DemoText"
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >url</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	URL

**示例值**："http://www.feishu.cn"
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >pc_url</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	PC上的URL

**示例值**："http://www.feishu.cn"
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >enterprise_email</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	企业邮箱，请先确保已在管理后台启用飞书邮箱服务

**示例值**："demo@mail.com"
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >is_frozen</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >boolean</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	否
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	是否冻结用户

**示例值**：false
	</md-td>
</md-tr>

  </md-tbody>
</md-table>
:::



### 请求体示例

```json
{
    "name": "张三",
    "en_name": "San Zhang",
    "email": "zhangsan@gmail.com",
    "mobile": "13011111111",
    "mobile_visible": false,
    "gender": 1,
    "avatar_key": "2500c7a9-5fff-4d9a-a2de-3d59614ae28g",
    "department_ids": [
        "od-4e6ac4d14bcd5071a37a39de902c7141"
    ],
    "leader_user_id": "ou_7dab8a3d3cdcc9da365777c7ad535d62",
    "city": "杭州",
    "country": "中国",
    "work_station": "杭州",
    "join_time": 2147483647,
    "employee_no": "1",
    "employee_type": 1,
    "orders": [
        {
            "department_id": "od-4e6ac4d14bcd5071a37a39de902c7141",
            "user_order": 100,
            "department_order": 100
        }
    ],
    "custom_attrs": [
        {
            "type": "TEXT",
            "id": "DemoId",
            "value": {
                "text": "DemoText",
                "url": "http://www.feishu.cn",
                "pc_url": "http://www.feishu.cn"
            }
        }
    ],
    "enterprise_email": "demo@mail.com",
    "is_frozen": false
}
```



## 响应



### 响应体
:::html
<md-table>
  <md-thead>
      <md-tr>
      <md-th style="width: 40%;">名称</md-th>
      <md-th style="width: 20%;">类型</md-th>
      <md-th style="width: 30%;">描述</md-th>
      </md-tr>
  </md-thead>
  <md-tbody>

<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >code</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >int</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	错误码，非 0 表示失败
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >msg</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	错误描述
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-name" >data</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >\-</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	\-
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >user</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >user</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	用户信息
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >union_id</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	用户的union_id
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >user_id</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	租户内用户的唯一标识

**字段权限要求**：
 <md-perm href="/ssl:ttdoc/ukTMukTMukTM/uQjN3QjL0YzN04CN2cDN">获取用户 userid</md-perm>
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >open_id</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	用户的open_id
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >name</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	用户名

**数据校验规则**：

- 最小长度：`1` 字符
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >en_name</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	英文名
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >email</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	邮箱

**字段权限要求**：
 <md-perm href="/ssl:ttdoc/ukTMukTMukTM/uQjN3QjL0YzN04CN2cDN">获取用户邮箱</md-perm>
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >mobile</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	手机号

**字段权限要求**：
 <md-perm href="/ssl:ttdoc/ukTMukTMukTM/uQjN3QjL0YzN04CN2cDN">获取用户手机号</md-perm>
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >mobile_visible</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >boolean</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	手机号码可见性，true 为可见，false 为不可见，目前默认为 true。不可见时，组织员工将无法查看该员工的手机号码
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >gender</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >int</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	性别

**可选值有**：
- `0`：保密
- `1`：男
- `2`：女
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >avatar_key</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	头像的文件Key，可通过“消息与群组/消息/图片信息”中的“上传图片”接口上传并获取头像文件 Key
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >avatar</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >avatar_info</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	用户头像信息
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >avatar_72</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	72*72像素头像链接
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >avatar_240</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	240*240像素头像链接
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >avatar_640</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	640*640像素头像链接
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >avatar_origin</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	原始头像链接
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >status</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >user_status</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	用户状态
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >is_frozen</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >boolean</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	是否冻结
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >is_resigned</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >boolean</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	是否离职
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >is_activated</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >boolean</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	是否激活
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >department_ids</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string\[\]</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	用户所属部门的ID列表
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >leader_user_id</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	用户的直接主管的用户ID
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >city</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	城市
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >country</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	国家
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >work_station</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	工位
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >join_time</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >int</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	入职时间
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >is_tenant_manager</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >boolean</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	是否是租户管理员
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >employee_no</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	工号
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >employee_type</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >int</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	员工类型
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >orders</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >user_order\[\]</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	用户排序信息
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >department_id</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	排序信息对应的部门ID
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >user_order</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >int</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	用户在其直属部门内的排序，数值越大，排序越靠前
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >department_order</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >int</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	用户所属的多个部门间的排序，数值越大，排序越靠前
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >custom_attrs</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >user_custom_attr\[\]</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	自定义属性
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >type</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	自定义属性类型
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >id</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	自定义属性ID
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >value</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >user_custom_attr_value</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	自定义属性取值
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >text</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	属性文本
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >url</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	URL
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >pc_url</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	PC上的URL
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >enterprise_email</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	企业邮箱，请先确保已在管理后台启用飞书邮箱服务
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >need_send_notification</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >boolean</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	是否发送提示消息
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >notification_option</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >notification_option</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	创建用户的邀请方式
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >channels</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string\[\]</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	通道列表，枚举值：
sms（短信邀请），email（邮件邀请）
	</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
	<md-td>
	&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;<span style="color: #8F959E">∟</span>&nbsp;<md-text type="field-name" >language</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	<md-text type="field-type" >string</md-text>
	</md-td>
	<md-td>
	语言类型

**可选值有**：
- `zh-CN`：中文
- `en-US`：英文
- `ja-JP`：日文
	</md-td>
</md-tr>

  </md-tbody>
</md-table>
:::



### 响应体示例

```json
{
    "code": 0,
    "msg": "success",
    "data": {
        "user": {
            "union_id": "on_94a1ee5551019f18cd73d9f111898cf2",
            "user_id": "ou_7dab8a3d3cdcc9da365777c7ad535d62",
            "open_id": "ou_7dab8a3d3cdcc9da365777c7ad535d62",
            "name": "张三",
            "en_name": "San Zhang",
            "email": "zhangsan@gmail.com",
            "mobile": "13011111111",
            "mobile_visible": false,
            "gender": 1,
            "avatar_key": "2500c7a9-5fff-4d9a-a2de-3d59614ae28g",
            "avatar": {
                "avatar_72": "https://foo.icon.com/xxxx",
                "avatar_240": "https://foo.icon.com/xxxx",
                "avatar_640": "https://foo.icon.com/xxxx",
                "avatar_origin": "https://foo.icon.com/xxxx"
            },
            "status": {
                "is_frozen": false,
                "is_resigned": false,
                "is_activated": true
            },
            "department_ids": [
                "od-4e6ac4d14bcd5071a37a39de902c7141"
            ],
            "leader_user_id": "ou_7dab8a3d3cdcc9da365777c7ad535d62",
            "city": "杭州",
            "country": "中国",
            "work_station": "杭州",
            "join_time": 2147483647,
            "is_tenant_manager": false,
            "employee_no": "1",
            "employee_type": 1,
            "orders": [
                {
                    "department_id": "od-4e6ac4d14bcd5071a37a39de902c7141",
                    "user_order": 100,
                    "department_order": 100
                }
            ],
            "custom_attrs": [
                {
                    "type": "TEXT",
                    "id": "DemoId",
                    "value": {
                        "text": "DemoText",
                        "url": "http://www.feishu.cn",
                        "pc_url": "http://www.feishu.cn"
                    }
                }
            ],
            "enterprise_email": "demo@mail.com",
            "need_send_notification": false,
            "notification_option": {
                "channels": [
                    "sms"
                ],
                "language": "zh-CN"
            }
        }
    }
}
```



### 错误码
:::html
<md-table>
    <md-thead>
        <md-tr>
            <md-th style="width: 15%;">HTTP状态码</md-th>
            <md-th style="width: 15%;">错误码</md-th>
            <md-th style="width: 30%;">描述</md-th>
            <md-th style="width: 30%;">排查建议</md-th>
        </md-tr>
    </md-thead>
  <md-tbody>

<md-tr>
  <md-td>400</md-td>
  <md-td>41001</md-td>
  <md-td>mobile has already exist error</md-td>
  <md-td>手机号在企业内必须唯一，手机号在该企业创建过用户不允许再创建新用户</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
  <md-td>400</md-td>
  <md-td>41002</md-td>
  <md-td>email has already exist error</md-td>
  <md-td>邮箱在企业内必须唯一，邮箱在该企业创建过用户不允许再创建新用户</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
  <md-td>409</md-td>
  <md-td>41003</md-td>
  <md-td>user account conflict error</md-td>
  <md-td>用户的联系方式属于两个不同的飞书账号，添加失败。如有疑问请联系Lark客服</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
  <md-td>400</md-td>
  <md-td>41004</md-td>
  <md-td>mobile is invalid error</md-td>
  <md-td>手机号不合法，请检查是否是正确的手机号格式</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
  <md-td>400</md-td>
  <md-td>41005</md-td>
  <md-td>email is invalid error</md-td>
  <md-td>不是合法邮箱的邮箱地址，请检查邮箱地址的有效性</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
  <md-td>400</md-td>
  <md-td>41006</md-td>
  <md-td>no user name error</md-td>
  <md-td>没有设置user的name</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
  <md-td>400</md-td>
  <md-td>41011</md-td>
  <md-td>userID already exist error</md-td>
  <md-td>user_id是企业内用户的唯一ID，不能重复</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
  <md-td>400</md-td>
  <md-td>41014</md-td>
  <md-td> user name sensitive error</md-td>
  <md-td>name中包含敏感信息，如有疑问，请联系客服</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
  <md-td>400</md-td>
  <md-td>41016</md-td>
  <md-td>department has too many users  error</md-td>
  <md-td>一个部门中有过多的用户，用户数量超过了500</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
  <md-td>400</md-td>

  <md-td>岗位信息无效</md-td>

  <md-td>岗位code无效</md-td>

  <md-td>400</md-td>

  <md-td>一个用户至多只能有设置一个主岗</md-td>

<md-tr>
  <md-td>400</md-td>
  <md-td>41022</md-td>
  <md-td>user tenant not match error</md-td>
  <md-td>检查是否使用其他企业的凭证访问当前企业的资源</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
  <md-td>400</md-td>
  <md-td>41023</md-td>
  <md-td>update department conflict position department error</md-td>
  <md-td>用户的岗位部门必须与用户的部门一致，更新用户部门需要同时更新相应的岗位部门，否则阻断更新操作</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
  <md-td>400</md-td>
  <md-td>41024</md-td>
  <md-td>update position department conflict department error</md-td>
  <md-td>用户的岗位部门必须与用户的部门一致，用户的新岗位部门也必须是用户的部门之一，否则阻断更新操作</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
  <md-td>400</md-td>
  <md-td>41025</md-td>
  <md-td>order department invalid error</md-td>
  <md-td>请求的用户排序信息中的部门ID必须是用户的部门ID之一</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
  <md-td>405</md-td>
  <md-td>41028</md-td>
  <md-td>user multi department need upgrade visibility error</md-td>
  <md-td>请在企业管理后台更新“组织架构可见范围”的补充规则</md-td>
</md-tr>


<md-tr>
  <md-td>400</md-td>
